description: This table contains BestPractice Advisory (BPA) trigger actions.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique alert ID for each alert.  You could link it to ALERT.ALT_ID to get patient and vendor information in table ALERT.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: BPA_TRGR_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The activity from which the BestPractice Advisory (BPA) was triggered.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
